column1: ap < 03:30|"nearly half-past three"|"Miss Penny looked at her watch. ""Good heavens!"" she said
column2: ""it's nearly half-past three. I must fly. Don't forget about the funeral service
column4: as she put on her coat. ""The tapers
column6: in the middle of the aisle
column7: the nuns in their white-winged coifs
column9: and the poor cowering creature without any teeth
column10: her face all caved in like an old woman's
column11: wondering whether she wasn't really and in fact dead - wondering whether she wasn't already in hell. Good-bye."""|"Nuns at Luncheon"|"Aldous Huxley"
